comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
Well, isn't THAT the pot calling the kettle black!
>The Lincoln Project roasted ~~as~~ by deranged hacks for orchestrating viral hoax to smear Youngkin

> The disgraced anti-Trump group The Lincoln Project is facing intense backlash for orchestrating the viral hoax involving tiki torch-holding individuals associating themselves with the Youngkin campaign. 

"Disgraced"? According to who? Fox news sounds very upset about the Lincoln Project taking a picture of some guys with tiki torches standing in front of the Youngkin bus.

> "Anyone who continues to associate themselves with The Lincoln Project owns this. This is who you are," Fourth Watch media critic Stever Krakauer wrote. 

Oh, Steve Krakauer sounds *very upset* about this P.R. stunt. He hates it when someone messes with a campaign bus.

Unless it's bumpkins with rifles on a Trump Train attacking a Biden bus in Texas and the  San Marcos police don't help, they just laugh about it. That seems within the realm of acceptable behavior around other people's buses.
And they say false flags don't happen
Faux News calls them deranged hacks, I call them patriotic heroes.
Fox is more outraged by this than what happened in 2017.
Youngkin thought they were legit, and he welcomed them.  Hard stop.

It really warms my dark and empty lil heart to see conservatives receive the same kind of underhanded ratfuck treatment they’ve been dishing to everyone else for the last century. 

I mean, until you widen focus and realize that the crazy people are winning and we’re all gonna have to deal with THAT in 2022 and 2024.
Joseph wulfson certainly knows about being a deranged hack.

But not nearly as deranged as the dangerous racists they were cosplaying.

I wouldn't say it was really a good idea, though, but it's ridiculous to attack them when the actual Republican electorate has not yet abandoned Trump.

There were MAGA people [shouting down the president](https://dailycaller.com/2021/10/27/joe-biden-terry-mcauliffe-virginia-rally-campaign/) at a McAuliffe event the other day.  If you can dish it out you better be able to take it.
Using a page right out of the Rove/gop playbook.
By the pearl clutchers on the right.  I think it was spot on.
